OOC: A-G was originally supposed to be Air-Ground but using 
them as concussion missiles will work just fine. =)

--- Pacifix / Crossroads / Swoop ---

Pacifix raises his arms to shield himself from Arty's blasts. One 
blast smashes into his heavily plated arms, and the other hits the 
wall above him, shaking the structure, and threatening to destroy 
the entrance to the hideout. <<These bots are going to want a way 
out soon...>> He tries to grab the reeling Arty. His eyes scan the 
other bots, and notice the particular bot fighting with them. 
<<Interesting...>>

Crossroads' eye's widden as a grenade comes at him. He ducks, 
and the grenade explodes behind him, throwing him forward. He 
gets up disoriented. He reorganizes himself, and prepares for other 
attacks.

Swoop flies past Arty, transforms, and lands near Branding. Swoop 
fires two missiles at the bot, and draws his thermal sword. 
"Dinobots thrash enemies."


On 29 May 2001, at 1:15, CYBERWOLF4 wrote:

> The Cybrats seemed to have the Autobots pinned between them when a
> sudden Photon blast flew through the smoke striking Branding knocking
> her off her feet and disabling one of her flamethrowers. She rolled
> around a corner to use the building as cover while she assessed her
> damage. "WE Better make this quick" she shouted over her comm to the
> other Cybrats." Reinforcements are arriving quickly." she was ecstatic
> at this point, the femm always knew that sooner or later they'd hit
> the wrong target, and this was quickly becomming that time.
> 
> Arty's equilibreum was sent into a state of confusion as Swoops
> missles took effect (I'm thinking that A-G missles would have that
> effect instead of causing impact damage.) the tank transformed, his
> twin cannons taking thier positions on his shoulders. He fired both
> barrels at Pacifix hoping to clear a way for thier escape. Flames from
> Slag engulfed him from behind making him greatfull for his thick hide,
> the temperature was riseing and his missles were useless, if he were
> to arm one in that temperature it would explode before he could launch
> it.
